CalDAVAccountDescription.title: Account Description
CalDAVAccountDescription.description: The display name of the account (e.g. "Company Calendar Account")

CalDAVHostName.title: Account Hostname
CalDAVHostName.description: The IP address or fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the CalDAV server.

CalDAVPort.title: Port Number
CalDAVPort.description: The port on which to connect to the CalDAV server.

CalDAVPrincipalURL.title: Principal URL
CalDAVPrincipalURL.description: The base URL to the user's calendar. In macOS this URL is required if the user doesn't provide a password, because auto-discovery of the service will fail and the account won't be created.

CalDAVUsername.title: Account Username
CalDAVUsername.description: The user name for the CalDAV account.

CalDAVUseSSL.title: Use SSL
CalDAVUseSSL.description: Enable Secure Socket Layer communication with CalDAV server
